    • main

      public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException
      The main function of the program. It initializes the server socket with a free port, starts the ConnectionHandler and ThreadSend threads, and keeps accepting new connections indefinitely.
      Parameters:
      args - The command-line arguments.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
